ability.Giants Craft: Boosts the power of Rock and Steel-type moves by 50%. The user's Defense increases by 1 stage when hit by a Rock-type move.
ability.One-Eyed Stubbornness: Has a 30% chance to endure a move that would otherwise knock out Cyclorax with 1 HP.

Titanic Strike.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Forged Fist.effect: Has a 30% chance to cause the target to flinch.

Stubborn Stare.effect: Increases the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage each. Also lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

Counter.effect: Deals damage to the target if its hits the user with a physical attack this turn, equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack.
